ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS EPO Hot Springs Station
ResourceHeader.Description: Hot Springs (HOTS) station is located in Hot Springs, Montana, USA. This station has an Educational Public Outreach magnetometer operated by UCLA. EPO magnetometers should be used carefully, as they may be subject to environmental noise. Magnetic Latitude: 54.62 Magnetic Longitude: 307.19 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 8.1333 Magnetic Declination: 15.22 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007.
